edge: Discussion Papers often focus on analyzing the relationship between education and economic growth.
Discussion Papers also explore how economic growth can be promoted through various educational policies and initiatives.
In Discussion Paper No.176, the author examines the impact of education on economic growth in a specific context.
Each Discussion Paper is assigned a unique identification number for easy reference and retrieval.
The year of publication is also mentioned along with the month in which the paper was published.
